about_the_game:
▲ An adventure in a different world harem of the young master of the Gassan sect.
▲ A Roguelike gameplay that combines strategy and leisure.
▲ Different world girls with diverse personalities and backgrounds.


A Roguelike game that features cultivation elements and involves crossing over into a different world.
You will play as the young master of the Gassan sect and embark on an adventure in a different world harem.
In order to revive the sect and achieve your dream of building a flourishing harem in the other world, will you bravely step into the teleportation array and journey into the unknown?
Will you be able to overcome the challenges and face unknown opponents with the help of companions from different worlds?
Join together to find the answers along the way!





actor

The young master of the Gassan sect in the world of cultivation.
As a young man who was supposed to be a pride of heaven, he has to face the harsh reality that the sect is in decline. He sets foot into the mysterious teleportation array in the back mountain of the Gassan sect, and travels to an unknown world.
His only goal is to fulfill his dream - to build his own harem in the other world.

Qing Niao

By your side is a maid who has been through many hardships with you.
She is one of the top two experts in the Gassan sect and is known as the "Iron Wall of the Storm" in the world of cultivation.
Despite the challenges you have faced together, she has never left your side and remains loyal to you.

Fan Zhengying

The head chef of the Fire Flame Spring Roll Shop.
She wears a spring roll hat and pizza skirt as her standard attire.
She has a group of followers who are not very loyal but love her delicious food.
She is seen as a cult leader in the eyes of the religious tribunal.
After meeting with the protagonist's team, another secret about her will be revealed...

Karina

The silver-haired girl wandering in the misty forest.
She is mischievous and has an arrogant personality.
She spends her days playing and living a playful life.
She hopes to one day leave the forest and venture into the outside world for adventure.


Automatic combat gameplay with Roguelike elements.
Different combinations and companion choices bring different combat experiences.



Unknown enemies and powerful bosses await your challenge.



Trade with the time and space merchant to expand your gameplay options.
Dozens of beautifully crafted CG images and straightforward story themes, ranging from adventure stories to romantic encounters.
The scenes you want to see will be presented one after another.

The text of the demo version and the official release version may be slightly different, but the gameplay and performance are basically the same.
If you like this gameplay and are interested in the story, please buy the official version.

content_descriptors.notes:
The characters in the game are over 18 years old.
caution.

name: 不双修就去异世界探险吧 Demo
